title: Forgot PBE Account
body:
Okay so, for the first time in a while I decided I was going to play on my PBE in order to play URF, when I realized i've forgotten my PBE username. I'm trying to use the account username recovery, But every time I enter my e-mail for the username to be sent to absolutely **NOTHING** happens and I am getting no e-mail and i've checked my spam and everything. I know i've got an accepted PBE account, because when I go to the application page, It asks me to download the client, But I just can't remember my user name and the account recovery isn't working.

Help please???

replies.body:
Have you checked your spam folder for the email? If it's not there, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist in recovering your PBE account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
